ruleEngine.entity

Enum EUnitProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<EUnitProperty>
      • ruleEngine.entity.EUnitProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<EUnitProperty>

    public enum EUnitProperty
extends java.lang.Enum<EUnitProperty>
    Enum used to represent every type of unit in the game, with their appropriates data.

      • isGetBonusDef

        public boolean isGetBonusDef()
        Returns:
        true if the unit benefits of a bonus of defence power when placed on some building, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        EBuildingProperty

      • isRelayCommunication

        public boolean isRelayCommunication()
        Returns:
        true if the unit generate communication axis on its own, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        CommRules

      • isCanAttack

        public boolean isCanAttack()
        Returns:
        true if the unit is allowed to initiate attack, false otherwise.

      • isCanCharge

        public boolean isCanCharge()
        Returns:
        true if the unit is allowed to initiate charges, a special attack.
        See Also:
        AttackRules

      • getDisplayName

        public java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Returns:
        The name of the unit to display for the end user.
